reviewerNotes: Major architectural pivot: DB-centric approach per user feedback
Approved at all iterations (4 with warnings, all addressed). Final 2 warnings about backfill ambiguities were addressed before iteration cap.

Approved at iteration 5/5 (cap). 2 blockers + 7 warnings resolved in iteration 1, all subsequent iterations had zero blockers. Final 3 warnings are informational (spec/design phasing divergence, multi-promotion format detail, parallel import concern) — all addressed with clarifying notes.

Phase-reviewer: Approved at iteration 5/5 (cap). 2 blockers resolved (C9/C10 assignments, interface I2/I3/I4/I7 assignments). 5 warnings resolved (parallelism wording, refactor phases, rollback gates, done-when criteria, critical path label).

concerns: Phase 2B implementation tasks (3.3, 3.5, 3.7, 3.9, 3.11) lack function-level detail compared to Phase 1 TDD tasks
Task 4.5 server startup test needs DB isolation mechanism for cleanup
Task 6.1 Done-when mentions set_parent but Action section does not include set_parent call
Task 1.7 triggers were created in Task 1.3 but test is written in 1.6 — breaks strict RED-GREEN TDD pattern
Task 1.18 refactor has non-binary done-when (grep output reviewed)
Task 3.12 missing explicit test command in done-when
Task 4.2 references design I2/I3/I4 but doesn't specify what to verify
Task 3.12 grep pattern name constraint may be too specific for implementer naming choices
Task 1.7 mixes verify and fix concerns (acceptable as-is per reviewer)
Task 4.5 timeout/sleep values may cause flaky tests on slow machines

specify.reviewerNotes: Approved at spec-reviewer iteration 3/5, phase-reviewer iteration 1/5. 6 blockers found and resolved across 2 iterations.
